items.question: What's the difference between Premium and Yearly plans?
items.answer: The Premium plan is billed monthly at €6.99 per month, while the Yearly plan is billed once per year at €69.99. Both plans offer exactly the same features: unlimited transactions, advanced budget analytics, unlimited saving pockets, and custom categories. The Yearly plan saves you 17% compared to monthly payments.

items.question: Is there a mobile app available?
items.answer: Pocketly is currently in beta and will be available soon on both iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). Join our waitlist to get early access and be notified as soon as we launch!

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. No hidden fees, no penalties. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
